author: Dylan Chong
text: 'Wow! Pico Taco is the definition of a go to taco spot
column5: with great prices and quality tacos to keep you going. So fresh and scrumptious!'

author: Mark Tait
text: 'Why does the guac look like it was made with blue Powerade ? Food was good. Guac is sketchy'

author: jon
text: 'Terrible- put no onions in the notes and even called to confirm and she confirmed she saw the notes . Of course they put a ton of onions. So careless so i had to throw it out and waste money. Terribly packaged drink spilled all over the boxes just so carless all around would not order again - to many great places in hoboken that actually care.'

author: John Coviello
text: 'Been living in Hoboken for over 4 years and just ordered from Pico Taco for the first time. Ordered 4 tacos - fish
column5: al pastor
column7: and steak. They were all equally amazing. Best bang for your buck and they have 1/2 off for Taco Tuesday!'

author: Sebastian Coe
text: "Went the other day for some horchata
column5: which I was excited about since it's hard to find in the area. Gosh
column6: what I got was pure slime
column7: if I had tasted it in the restaurant I would have given it back. I tried to water it down and mix it at home
column8: but there was just no way to salvage it
column9: just plain awful. They should save themselves the grief and take it off the menu."

author: Ryan
text: 'Went into Pico Taco at 9:35am and was told "Sorry we just opened". Lady working wouldn\'t even take my order because they were open
column5: but just not ready to start selling food. Advise for Pico taco. Change your opening time to later in the day if your workers can\'t get the restaurant ready in time'

author: Nate King
text: 'So good I eat here once a week!'

author: Rebecca
text: 'Great little spot in Hoboken. Stands out from most other offerings in town in the fact that they serve good food.'

author: Lola S
text: 'Shrimp tacos are mind blowing!!! I became addicted and caught myself ordering every night for a week!'

author: Jeannette Calle
text: 'The birrias are good
column5: but the consome is bad
column6: tastes like canned hot dog chili
column7: and the steak tacos are tough and flavorless. They have got to change their consume recipe and quick'

author: Tina
text: 'Hands down amazing!! We ordered the Birria tacos and they were 10/10!! This was our first time trying this place and it was on a whim
column5: best decision we could‚Äôve made. Honestly we can‚Äôt wait to go back'

author: Karen Wang
text: 'It‚Äôs the perfect place to grab a few tacos
column5: sit outside
column6: and people watch. The al pastor and fish tacos are a must get!'

author: kamath psk
text: 'Loved the baja fish tacos!! üíØ\nI would have loved to eat the tacos immediately because the fish was not very crispy by the time we got home. But the flavours complemented each other beautifully. There was crunchy cabbage (I think it was cabbage lol
column5: not sure)
column7: the fish was cooked beautifully! I ate mine with the green sauce(jalapeno I think?). The orange sauce (habanero I think) was a little too spicy for me
column8: it also had a sweet undertone.\n\nI got 2 tacos! They were very filling! I definitely recommend the fish tacos at Pico taco.'

author: Anna Borysova
text: 'Awesome place with delicious food at a very reasonable prices
column5: lightning quick delivery and delivery drivers who read the notes ^_^'

author: Marcelino Portillo
text:
'(Translated by Google) Good taco food like my ranch from my plate

(Original)

author: Petra Adorno
text:

author: Dushyanthi Naveendra
text: 'My go to for Mexican food.  Their tacos and bowls are always so delicious.  The flavors are outstanding and the food tastes fresh.  Do yourself a favor and order from here!! You will not be disappointed!'

author: Alexandra Auth
text: "Ehhhh. Not sure why there are so many rave reviews. We ordered the Al Pastor
column5: Carne Asada and Carnitas tacos. They delivered 1 Al Pastor and 2 Carne Asada. Annoying but not a huge deal. The Al Pastor tacos were more Chinese food type chunks of pork with little of the delicious spicy tangy pineapple flavor they should have. The Carne Asada were also not that juicy grilled flavor you'd expect. The meat had tons of fat all over the pieces which made it really hard to swallow. The chips were good but definitely won't be ordering from here again."

author: DAVID LOFREDDO
text: 'Great Tacos
column5: good prices

author: Megan E. Smith
text: 'The street corn was extra limey and extra good. Chorizo was a tad greasy (as it is)
column5: fish taco was my fave. Nice fresh fixins üëç'

author: J R
text: 'Good prices good food'

author: a.k negriz
text: 'asada tacos just toooo good\nreal taco flavor no joke'

author: Michael Desousa
text: 'Really great tacos
column5: normally I go to Jersey city for good tacos but this place really delivers. Good prices and the tacos taste amazing. This is def the best tacos place I‚Äôve ever eaten in Hoboken. Clean and friendly staff and they really now how to keep it moving inside!!'

author: Aubrey Murfy
text: 'Taquerias are hard to come by especially if it‚Äôs a very good one. I tried all of the tacos already and I recommend the steak
column5: chorizo
column6: and chicken. I give it a five out five stars.'

author: Georgina Edionseri
text: "Pico Taco is awesome. Great food and great service all at a super affordable price! When we were able to eat-in
column5: the environment is a nice place to grab lunch with your friends or coworkers. The style is a southwestern
column6: Mexican vibe. The food is made-to-order and made with love! I've never had a bad taco there. Also
column7: the observe TACO TUESDAY and celebrate with half-off all tacos!"

author: Melanie Tam
text: "*Quarantine Delivery Review*\n\nInstead of ordering our usual sushi delivery
column5: we decided to go with some tacos because it had been a while since we had some. And of course
column6:
our favorite thing to do is order too much food for two people. Here is everything we ordered:

Al Pastor Tacos - these were great. Flavor was perfect and they don't skimp on the meat
Chorizo Quesadilla - you really can't go wrong with chorizo or quesadilla
Baja Style Crispy Fish Taco - this was my favorite of the group but probably also because I love fish tacos. The piece of fish in each taco was big
column7: which I appreciated because I hate when taco spots give you the tiniest piece of fish and fill the rest of the taco with veggies\nCarne Asada Tacos - this was my least favorite. The meat was a bit chewy and it was also bland\nCarne Asada Fries - again
column8: the meat wasn't great but the rest of the toppings were good. I normally don't like soggy fries but somehow
column9: the soggy fries worked here. I'd like to see an al pastor version of the fries.\n\nOverall
column10: everything was great (aside from the carne asada). I'd definitely order again. I think I'll try out their tortas next!"

author: julie foster
text: 'The food was outstanding! The best tacos in town!'

author: Alexander Chisar
text: 'Amazing tacos! üåÆ'

author: Cherri Lam
text: 'Ordered three tacos there first time. The steak taco was super blend with ZERO seasoning and the meat was TOUGH! The carnitas was ok but still under seasoning. Their taco shell was soft but oily.\nLong wait.... even there wasn‚Äôt a lot of people.'

author: Jeremy Zuttah
text: 'The food is really good here. Much better than the other ‚ÄúMexican‚Äù restaurants in Hoboken. The new breakfast items are a hit too. Always surprised it‚Äôs usually empty when I go there.'

author: Zei S
text: 'Went for taco tuesday where you get 2 for 1 taco. Chicken was a bit bland but hey you get 2 for 3 something dollars.\nThey have horchata and churros although they only gave me 4 instead of advertised 6 in to go order.'

author: Solbrisa Rodriguez
text: 'Food was very delicious. It is very authentic. I love the hand made tortillas. My favorite is the fish tacos. I definitely recommend coming here. Worth waiting for.'

text: 'The al Pastor was super authentic super delicious really nice staff a bit of a wait for tacos but that must mean everythings made to order. The girl running the register was super cute

text: 'Great chips and salsa. Steak and chorizo tacos were both excellent.'
